casebody.data:
C. H. KRAUSE, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. MISSISSIPPI COAL CORPORATION and Electric Shovel Coal Corporation, Defendants-Appellees. Nos. 6315-6322. Circuit Court of Appeals, Seventh Circuit. Jan. 27, 1938. See, also, 93 F.2d 515. J. Fred Gilster, of Chester, Ill., for appellant. Walter T. Gunn and Harold F. Lindley, both of Danville, Ill., for appellees.

Before EVANS and SPARKS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Pursuant to the order of this court entered this day, .it is now here ordered, adjudged, and decreed by this court that the decree óf the District Court of the United States for the Eastern District of Illinois in this cause be, and the same is hereby, affirmed, with costs.
